about_the_game:
TOEWR LE FENCE HAS BEEN DISCONTINUED
This game was quite literally my first baby steps in game development. Nothing was organized and I quite literally have no idea how to code. This was also made back when I was like 6th grade LMFAO (I'm not even kidding I literally feel so bad for those of you who bought this disaster of a game)

Welp, it's been a good 7 years since I made TLF (at the time of editing this). I've gotten exponentially better at Unity Engine and scripting, and it all stems from Toewr le Fence.

So - I'd like to thank each and every one of you who supported my very first steps into the world of game development. It's brought me nothing but a good experience, which will stick with me for all future projects I'll be working on!

The source code is available through my website. Check it out if you want to mess around with it urself (TL;DR idc what u do with the code u can sell it if u want. just credit me or smth. i also don't care if u don't cuz I'm too lazy to hire lawyers lmao)

Meanwhile, I'll be working on better and more exciting stuff. Also check them out on my website :D
detailed_description:
TOEWR LE FENCE HAS BEEN DISCONTINUED
This game was quite literally my first baby steps in game development. Nothing was organized and I quite literally have no idea how to code. This was also made back when I was like 6th grade LMFAO (I'm not even kidding I literally feel so bad for those of you who bought this disaster of a game)

Welp, it's been a good 7 years since I made TLF (at the time of editing this). I've gotten exponentially better at Unity Engine and scripting, and it all stems from Toewr le Fence.

So - I'd like to thank each and every one of you who supported my very first steps into the world of game development. It's brought me nothing but a good experience, which will stick with me for all future projects I'll be working on!

The source code is available through my website. Check it out if you want to mess around with it urself (TL;DR idc what u do with the code u can sell it if u want. just credit me or smth. i also don't care if u don't cuz I'm too lazy to hire lawyers lmao)

Meanwhile, I'll be working on better and more exciting stuff. Also check them out on my website :D
legal_notice: Because the game has been discontinued, I won't care too much what you do with the game and the public source code. If you do sell it, however, I would ask that you do credit me. I won't do anything if you don't cuz I ain't bothering to pay money for legal stuff

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 +
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 256 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: This game should be pretty lightweight. Should not be that graphics intensive
